description: Mobile techniques used by KeyRaider, ATT&CK software S0288 v1.1
name: KeyRaider (S0288)

techniques.comment: KeyRaider has built-in functionality to lock victims out of devices and hold them for ransom.
Most KeyRaider samples hook SSLRead and SSLWrite functions in the itunesstored process to intercept device communication with the Apple App Store.
Most KeyRaider samples search to find the Apple account's username, password and device's GUID in data being transferred.
